error_details.explanation: Conceptual error. The "half" given to this brother should be half of what is left after donation (60/2=30 left), not half of what he has before donation.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 110
He had 80-20=<<80-20=60>>60 after the donation
He kept 80/2=<<80/2=40>>40 after giving half to his brother
So he has 40*3=<<40*3=120>>120 coins
He then does 1 more donation and has 120-10=<<120-10=110>>110 coins left
